com.aurel.track.lucene.index.associatedFields

Class AbstractAssociatedFieldIndexer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aurel.track.lucene.index.associatedFields.AbstractAssociatedFieldIndexer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAssociatedFieldsIndexer, ILookupFieldIndexer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AttachmentIndexer, BudgetPlanIndexer, ExpenseIndexer, LinkIndexer

    public abstract class AbstractAssociatedFieldIndexer
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAssociatedFieldsIndexer
    Base class for associated field indexers
